eventsea.title: Eventsea
eventsea.description: EventSea is a decentralized events platform for events organizers and attendees. Built on the top of Linea, EventSea offers a transparent, secure, and user-centric platform for event creation and ticketing.

polis.title: Polis
polis.description: Polis is a platform dedicated to showcasing web3 tools, templates, and boilerplates. Frequently, these resources remain isolated or challenging to find within the web3 landscape. Polis is committed to addressing this challenge by offering a solution to enhance their discoverability and accessibility.

form-xchange.title: Form-XChange
form-xchange.description: A feedback form application built on top of Linea ZKEVM.
